extendedInfo.description: Italians are famous all around the world for many things, but the most important Italian souvenir is it's people. Carry a touch of Italian romance with you, and listen whenever you want to sweet Italian love quotes. Now, with Italians Do It Better, you can dream of your Italian lover, when she softly whispered to you these same words of love. Use photos you've taken with your Android device, or strike up a fantasy romance with the beautiful woman included with the app.All around the world, everybody knows thatâ¦ Italians Do It Better!The app has been translated into Italian, English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, and Arabic. Keywords: Italian Love , Romantic Souvenir, Love Quotes, Romance, Love Messages, Romantic Messages,  Romantic Forwards, Valentine, Love Greetings, Valentine's Messages, Valentines Quotes, Valentines Messages, Romantic Quotes, Love Poems, Passion, Love, Heart, Soul***PLEASE READ***The new permissions are required to bring you new some new cool features â*Search shortcut icon on your home screen.*Search shortcut on your bookmarks.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.If you do use it, we'll get a few cents - so thanks! If you don't want it, no worries either.All permissions added are completely harmless and at no point do we collect or store any personal information! You can read about them here - http://www.startapp.com/permissions/
